name: Domestic Violence Resources
description: Domestic violence support, training and resources for LGBTQ.
fullDescription: Domestic violence support, training and resources for LGBTQ.
whatTheyOffer: Domestic violence support, training and resources for LGBTQ.
howToGetIt: - LGBTQ individuals dealing with violence or abuse, call CUAV at (415) 333-4357 or email: counseling@cuav.org to schedule an appointment - To file a domestic/dating violence restraining order, contact the Access Center for Family Law and Self-Help Services at (415) 551-5880 - To reach the domestic violence hotline/shelter, contact WOMAN Inc., at (877) 384-3578
address: 427 South Van Ness Avenue, San Francisco, CA, 94103
